summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hinds Street from 1st Avenue South to the center of Block 348, Seattle Tide Lands; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13199 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
